title: 2014/C 182/01: Council Decision of 12 June 2014 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Safety and Health at Work for Lithuania
header:
14.6.2014 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 182/16
COUNCIL DECISION
of 12 June 2014
appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Safety and Health at Work for Lithuania
2014/C 182/04
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union,
Having regard to Council Decision of 22 July 2003 setting up an Advisory Committee on Safety and Health at Work (1), and in particular Article 3 thereof,
Having regard to the list of candidates submitted to the Council by the Governments of the Member States,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decisions of 22 April 2013 (2) and of 2 December 2013 (3), the Council appointed the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Safety and Health at Work for the period from 22 April 2013 until 28 February 2016.
(2) The government of Lithuania has submitted a further nomination for a post to be filled,
main_body:
The following person is appointed as an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Safety and Health at Work for the period ending on 28 February 2016:
III.   EMPLOYERS’ REPRESENTATIVES
Country Member Alternate
Lithuania  Ms Nadežda FILIPOVA
The Council will appoint the members and alternate members not yet nominated at a later date.
This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 12 June 2014.
For the Council
The President
Y. MANIATIS
(1)  OJ C 218, 13.9.2003, p. 1.
(2)  Council Decision of 22 April 2013 appointing the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Safety and Health at Work (OJ C 120, 26.4.2013, p. 7).
(3)  Council Decision of 2 December 2013 appointing the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Safety and Health at Work for Croatia, Hungary, Portugal and the United Kingdom (OJ C 358, 7.12.2013, p. 3).
